metadata.dc:author: Aragón, J A
Rodríguez de la Rua
Carrasco, B
Pastor, J C
metadata.dc:description: CASE REPORT We report the evolution, complications and functional results of a 21-year-old patient with diabetic retinopathy, haemophilia and HIV+. DISCUSSION The risk of developing complications should not delay the treatment in diabetic retinopathy patients with haemophilia and HIV+.
metadata.dc:title: Retinopatía diabética en un paciente con infección por VIH y hemofilia tipo A.
[Diabetic retinopathy in a patient with HIV infection and type A hemophilia].
metadata.dc:publisher: Archivos de la Sociedad Espanola de Oftalmologia
